GenServe

 How to?
  • Setup and configure a server
  • Setup 404 pages and other unhandled uris
  • Serving static pages
  • Serving dynamic pages
  • Run multiple domains on the same IP
  • Generate self-signed certificates automatically
  • Run a script when the server starts
  • Setup Auto Reloading
  • Always start a server within an Electron App
  • URL Rewrite
  • Enable plugins
  • Create plugins
